title: PHP Login Script with Session
description: A site with a large number of scripts featuring SQL injection vulnerabilities. A number of articles, including this one, incorrectly advise programmers to store passwords in plain text.

issues.description: This site contains a large number of SQL injections, all or mostly involving the legacy mysql library. Interestingly the [author cites parameterisation as a benefit of MySQLi](http://phppot.com/php/mysql-vs-mysqli-in-php/) elsewhere on the site.
